title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via simple Python client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: browser, Node, Deno, Bun compatible with fetch-based client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embeddings, tool-calling and structured output via LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama: markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete with idiomatic Ruby blocks and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama: interactive chat, conversation history, syntax highlighting, shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a GitHub Copilot replacement: inline suggestions, chat panel, code explain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration: OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for building RAG pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, list, pull, delete with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama: session memory, model selector, markdown rendering, one-command Docker run.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama: GPU/CPU nodes, PVC storage, ingress, autoscaling, Prometheus metrics.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines: test your apps against local LLMs in GitHub Actions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma: ingest PDFs, query with local embeddings, 100 % Python.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot powered by Ollama: slash commands, thread support, model switching, moderation hooks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance: summarize notes, generate text, Q&A over vault with Ollama backend.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Official Nim client for Ollama: async HTTP, static binary, zero dependencies, chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama: strongly-typed models, tokio async, streaming iterators, embed examples.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for Ollama: macOS/iOS apps can chat with local models via async/await and Combine publishers.
